website_summaries.verdict: This is a good light-duty vacuum for cleaning up small messes when you don't want to pull out a bigger, bulkier unit.
pros: Extension wand included for upholstery or high-up areas
cons: This unit doesn't have the most powerful suction, so it's not ideal for a home with pets

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum! It's so light and easy to use. I love how slim it is as I can get under couches/chairs/furniture to get out all the hiding dog hair. The headlights are a really nice touch too. It's fairly quiet and doesn't upset our two dogs the way some other appliances do. It's very light in my hand and so much easier to use to clean my wood floors vs the older big traditional vacuum (although I think for carpeted rooms you may still want to have a bigger unit on hand). It charges quickly and has lights to let you know how much battery is left.
customer_reviews.author: keri ann shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. I primarily use it on our stairs, which using a bulky full-siz vacuum is damn near impossible, and it's amazing! No cord to get caught up on and the suction power is great! If you're considering purchasing this, do it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Bissell Stick Vacuum delivers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic stick vacuum that has great suction! My kitty scatters her kibble everywhere and the Bissell cleans it all up. Cat hair? Not a problem. I think that it would easily compare to the other higher priced stick vacuums. Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M Young

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money...
customer_reviews.text: Great other than pretty much ZERO suction. Nearly worthless , wouldn’t even suck spider webs. 😭😭😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Sara Carter

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right and died after 9 months
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this vacuum so much, but its horrible. I have 2 short hair dogs and a cat so my hope was it would pick up fur on my hardwood floor and it doesn't. And don't try to use it on carpet. I have one small runner rug and it just stops working. I have had it just about a year now and it doesn't work at all. Im hoping my dad can fix it, but it doesn't turn on at all now. I don't know what its issue is. And the on button is also very hard to turn on. Don't waist your money
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyF

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this vacuum! I've had it for about 8 months now and it's held up really well. I use it to vacuum by car which is so convenient. Its perfect for vacuuming up little things around the house. Its not really meant for high carpet but it works really well on low carpet, wood, and tile. The battery life is about 20 mins but that's not too bad if you don't let it run continuously. If you turn it off when moving from room to room that really helps.
customer_reviews.author: Aria M.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Not even a year later n it has lost suction. Save ur money n invest in a Dyson
customer_reviews.author: cjw0219

customer_reviews.title: Finally a stick vacuum that really does a good job. The battery runs long enough to vacuum ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a stick vacuum that really does a good job. The battery runs long enough to vacuum our whole house - five rooms and a hall. Easy to charge and maintain. You probably still need a corded vac for really dirty jobs, but using this one frequently keeps things looking neat and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Since purchasing the Bissell Stick Vacuum, I find myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Since purchasing the Bissell Stick Vacuum, I find myself using it on a daily basis because it is so convenient, compact and easier to use than a regular vacuum cleaner. It is a breeze to bring this up and down the stairs to do both floors of our home. It goes from hard wood to carpeting with ease!
customer_reviews.author: DirtyMartini903

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, i was a little hesitant to purchase, but so glad that I did. It has been the best purchase so easy to use and extremely useful with two little ones. Its lightweight and I love the lights that allow you see where the dirt is hiding. Truly good quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: BISSELL Cordless Vacuum....works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for quick clean up. Picks up everything from dirt, dust, spider web, dog hair, etc. Good suction.
customer_reviews.author: MOC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good product, I will still buy it next time.
customer_reviews.author: HUANG,LI-CHEN

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Wife’s back up “dusting” vac and light work. Does excellent. We keep the dog hair at bay with this. Really good for the $$
customer_reviews.author: amazonfro

customer_reviews.title: The Suction Power is HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is worthless. I have exchanged it 3 times and now my 4th machine still has no suction. BISSELL will not refund my money. I do not recommend this machine at all!
customer_reviews.author: James Graham

customer_reviews.title: Good on bare floor or tight weave rugs only
customer_reviews.text: This would be great if it worked on my area rugs. It only works on tightly woven rugs and bare floor.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoSusan

customer_reviews.title: It’s as described!
customer_reviews.text: I’d like the battery to last longer and would recommend ordering the wall holder and extra filters when purchasing but I love it, so light and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: sian clements

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and empty the trash collected
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, lots of power, easy to use and empty the trash collected.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Davis

customer_reviews.title: Suction doesn’t suck and that sucks
customer_reviews.text: Rotating bristles work well but suction is awful - vacuum head doesn’t flush against floor in all positions. Good looking machine but doesn’t do its job
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Just love my new Bissell
customer_reviews.text: Just love my new Bissell. It's so easy to use and cleans up all dust and dirt. I've always wanted a cordless vacuum and so happy I now have one. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ann H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I also have Lightweight Cordless Hand Vacuum. Very convenient. One for my mom and one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: do not buy if you have pets!! It plugs up with pet hair when you vac the floor
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Another great product - more powerful suction that I expected. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Stuecken

customer_reviews.title: Probably can find a better
customer_reviews.text: Canister fills up very quickly, battery does not last more then 20 minutes. The most annoying thing is the roller does not stay flush with the floor so I have to push it down with my foot to keep contact with the floor. It is nice to have different attachments.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy Kleinow

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even use it much and it stopped working 😡 And it's only been two months. Don't know what to do. Cuz I paid a lot of money for this. I hope I get back my money 🙁
customer_reviews.author: avion Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Fun while it lasted....but that was only about 3 months before it just died. I thought the battery could not be overcharged? Dead as a doornail now.
customer_reviews.author: LG5

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight to use and lightweight pickup.
customer_reviews.text: I have to empty the canister every 5 minutes. We have two Golden Retrievers and they shed!!! It does OK, but not so well as our Miele. Not surprising considering the price difference. It's light and easy to use, however, so is ok for everyday--then use the Miele for a major vaccuum..
customer_reviews.author: Karen Helmboldt Winchell

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 2 months and worked great and THEN the on/off switch didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L Book

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed- Will Never Buy a Bissell Product Again
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned this vacuum the day I got it, I'm completely disappointed with this vacuum! I figured it just needed to charge longer in order to have better suction, but I was wrong. It's a terrible product and barely even picks up dust bunnies. It is capable of sucking up about 50% of the crumbs on the kitchen floor for 5 minutes before it's basically useless. It doesn't work well on any type of carpet, not even berber. Save yourself the money and use a broom instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: This vacuum works well, but has a few engineering ...
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum works well, but has a few engineering problems. The front of the beater often pops up and doesn’t touch the floor or pick up any debris. I have to gently tap it back into place several times each time I use it. It doesn’t work very well on stairs either. Every time you pick it up to go to the next stair, the beater flops back and forth. I would not buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Kkkkgggg512

customer_reviews.title: like small screw(1/8 by 3/16)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my shop. Several observations. The powered rotating head, on my painted concrete floor, has the following issue - small, hard objects, like small screw(1/8 by 3/16), will not be picked up, it just rattles around in the head, or spits it out the back. However the flat, non-powered head will pick it up. Yes the button is hard to push, but my issue is that you can't locate it most of the time without looking for it. So i put a raised drop of ca glue on it. Now I can feel it, and can turn it off and on without looking.
customer_reviews.author: marty2

customer_reviews.title: Works great. The only fault I've found is that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only fault I've found is that it won't just stand up by itself so you always have to put something in front of it to block it from falling on the floor. It has great suction and really picks up everything.
customer_reviews.author: A. Virginia Reagles

customer_reviews.title: Your next vacuum
customer_reviews.text: A bit expensive but well worth it. I bought a shark for 200 less than two years ago and it is already starting to break down. The cordless and lightweight functions of this vacuum are perfect. Still has tons of power. Takes up soooo much less room in the closet and the wife can carry it up the stairs herself. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard floors!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is great, I use it on the hard surfaces to get dog hair. I have no problems with it. It does okay on the carpet for a quick clean up. I have had this for 8 months and I have not had one issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria J

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: To begin with I was very impressed with this little vacuum. However after about a dozen uses it sounded like something snapped and there was no more suction. Thus it’s no good any longer. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the money is a waste for this
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it 4 months ago and used it may be 6 times . Its not sucking the dust at all.. All the money is a waste for this.
customer_reviews.author: SatyaRaj

customer_reviews.title: not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: OK not worth the price Dyson is better the head pops us keep having to push down. The charger falls out if it hits any thing it is good for getting under items...
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am not pleased with the suction of this vacuum. I was hoping it would pick up more floor debris for the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Small
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Small, easy to use, great for stairs and so much more. Liked it so much, bought two for another location.
customer_reviews.author: Lepley

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum I have a very bad back and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum I have a very bad back and it's light and easy for me to use I just would like to have an extra filter
customer_reviews.author: mamma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cleaner and light weight. Especially love the lights in front.
customer_reviews.author: Willie A. Chilek

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of it and the fact that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine today and I charged it up which didn't take long at all and I vacuumed my living room carpet, floors, carpeted stairs and a few other spots before I needed to recharge it again. I love the ease of it and the fact that I can take the top part off to do my stairs and that it's cordless. No more heavy vacuum up and down the stairs and a cord that doesn't reach all the way. I did notice my heavy vacuum sucks up better on the carpeted stairs than this one did but i have to remember this is smaller and the carpet is well worn.
customer_reviews.author: latc47

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice product
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice product. Purchased the Bissell in hopes that it would clean cat litter on the carpet around the litter box. Suction is good but looses some of its strength when coupled with the motorized brush head. The Bissell doesn’t get cat litter out of the carpet with the motorized brush head, but will clean the carpet with the upholstery head. The motorized brush head is nice to use for pet hair on furniture and beddings. Easy to empty dirt tank when it gets full. Battery life does last about 15 minutes when doing periodic cleanings. LED lights are a nice touch for cleaning in dark places. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ClimbHigh

customer_reviews.title: What an incredible little machine. I bought it for ...
customer_reviews.text: What an incredible little machine. I bought it for our 5th wheel camper and my wife keeps stealing it for the house. I am going to have to buy a second one so the wife will leave the one in the camper alone.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this product because I have always used Bissell ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I have always used Bissell products. This product broke after the return date had expired therefore I'm out of over two hundred dollars. I know that I will not purchase another Bissell Cordless product again. I hope that others have not had this problem. I have contacted my credit card company to find out if there is something else that I can do to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy the Protection Plan if you get this!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 3 months then on button was stuck in on position, once the battery ran out the unit is DEAD, won't charge, won't turn back on and no return policy from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's like 4 days past the return window on amazon and ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could rate this 0 stars, it has no redeeming qualities because it fails at the singular task it was designed for. It can't even properly vacuum up dust bunnies with the bristle attachment after a full charge with cleaned filters. It's like 4 days past the return window on amazon and now I'm stuck with this overpriced junk.
customer_reviews.author: kumquat

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with it when i received it
customer_reviews.text: After only 2,months the battery no longer holds a charge. I was happy with it when i received it.,but i am very disappointed it only lasted 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Noreen B

customer_reviews.title: BAD
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst vacuum Ive ever bought. Doesn't even pick up bird seed that is on a tiled floor. Hardly picks up dog hair. Have to empty it every 5 minutes or it stuffs up and then you have to dig the lint out. Better off with my hand held shark which does a lot more work. Save your money folks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other then that it's a good vacume
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum head keeps locking facing upward, forcing me to knock it back down to stay level with the floor. Other then that it's a good vacume
customer_reviews.author: mikey diamonds

customer_reviews.title: FORGET THIS ONE AND KEEP SHOPPING
customer_reviews.text: If you think you can use this vacuum to clean under a bed or all the way under furniture, forget it! If you push the vacuum all the way under a bed, the brush head part does not remain flat. It is elevated off the ground and is therefore not able to clean in a fully extended position. That is the main reason I purchased this vacuum. If you intend to vacuum under furniture, keep looking. This is not the vacuum for you. Description is totally misleading. I attempted to turn the vacuum nozzle in all directions, but no matter what I did it didn’t stay flat enough to pick up dirt under furniture. I returned it to Amazon today!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: not like the Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my kids. I was unhappy with the fact that it does not have a hanger, so it just sits in a corner or closet, not like the Dyson. I purchasred a Dyson/refurbished at Amazon and love it, more powerful too.
customer_reviews.author: Oregongal

product_meta.title: BISSELL Multi Reach Cordless Hard Floor Stick and Hand Vacuum, 2151A,Grey with Green Accents
product_meta.description: Introducing the Bissell multi reach cordless vacuum. Equipped with high-performance, cordless technology, it's engineered for versatile cleaning in even the hardest-to-reach spots. Powered by a removable, 22V lithium-ion battery, this lightweight, convertible vacuum delivers total cleaning comfort with up to 20 minutes of fade-free suction. For added versatility, the Bissell multi reach cordless vacuum includes an extension wand, motorized brush roll, crevice tool, and soft dusting brush. In addition, its bright LED lights and removable, easy-to-empty dirt tank make spotting and disposing of dirt easier than ever. A powerful, convenient, and easy-to-use convertible vacuum to complement your busy lifestyle is finally here.
feature_bullets: Dirt cup capacity -0.4 liters. Highly versatile, ultralight, cordless design cleans across different floor types and everywhere else your upright vacuum can't reach
Converts to a powerful Hand vacuum for easy cleaning of cars, upholstery, stairs, and other hard-to-reach spots
Removable 22V lithium-ion battery provides up to 20 minutes of fade-free cordless power
Ultra-light and nimble design with swivel steering and lay-flat handle easily maneuvers around and under furniture
Bright, wide-range LED lights illuminate dirt where it hides

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars188 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
